name: 像素世界 Pixel World
description:
This is a pixel sandbox game where you can place multiple different elements into the scene to create a unique little world.
You can fill a pool with water and raise fish in it, or plant flowers and trees on the sand.
You can corrode the ground with acid, or create a tornado to blow sand into the air.
You can also mix gunpowder and nitroglycerin to experience the explosive power of flames.
You can throw grenades, bombs, and other explosives into the scene to destroy the world you've created.

In this game, you can enjoy the pleasure of creating a world or experiencing the pleasure of destroying everything.
The game includes over 40 different elements such as water, fire, ice fire, gunpowder, and people, as well as creatures like birds, bees, and locusts, and plants like flowers and trees.
You can download other players' shared worlds for a new experience or share your own created world with other players if you wish.
